A fire department spokesman told John Bachman that Cochran would not comment on pending litigation but noted that the incident happened on Joel Baker 's watch. Thompson points out that, as a British unknown looking for American fame, Simon Cowell used meanness as a savvy PR move- one that wouldn't work for Jennifer Lopez or Steven Tyler . Outside of the music industry, no one in the United States knew who Simon Cowell was until he started making nasty comments during the first season promotions for the show, he says." Mike Pence , R-Ind., who is a favorite of fiscal and social conservatives but rejected appeals that he run for president, turned down an invitation to speak at CPAC, where he has appeared six times. At this time, the congressman is focusing his attention on Indiana, Mike Pence spokesman Matt Lloyd said." He hopes to participate in future CPAC opportunities as his schedule permits."
